#############################################################################################
# For advice on how to change settings please see
# http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/server-configuration-defaults.html
# *** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. It's a template which will be copied to the
# *** default location during install, and will be replaced if you
# *** upgrade to a newer version of MySQL.

[mysqld]

# Remove leading # and set to the amount of RAM for the most important data
# cache in MySQL. Start at 70% of total RAM for dedicated server, else 10%.
# innodb_buffer_pool_size = 128M

# Remove leading # to turn on a very important data integrity option: logging
# changes to the binary log between backups.
# log_bin

# These are commonly set, remove the # and set as required.
# basedir = .....
# datadir = .....
# port = .....
# server_id = .....


# Remove leading # to set options mainly useful for reporting servers.
# The server defaults are faster for transactions and fast SELECTs.
# Adjust sizes as needed, experiment to find the optimal values.
# join_buffer_size = 128M
# sort_buffer_size = 2M
# read_rnd_buffer_size = 2M 

sql_mode=NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES 

# Secure File Priv.
secure-file-priv=""

#############################################################################################


https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43510956/how-to-zip-a-folder-in-net-framework-4-0/43511407


########################### Author >> Publish button action ##################################

'Convert the entire folder into zip file
'Encrypt the zip file with the same key
Dim sourcePath As String = txtbox_destination_path.Text.Trim + "\" + Lo_part_no
Dim zipPath As String = sourcePath + ".zip"
Dim belPath As String = sourcePath + ".bel"
ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory(sourcePath, zipPath)

ProgressBar1.Value = 800

Encrypt(zipPath, belPath)

ProgressBar1.Value = 900

If File.Exists(belPath) Then
	File.Delete(zipPath)
End If

ProgressBar1.Value = 1000
					
					

########################### Publisher >> Browse button action ##################################
Private Sub btnbrowse_Source_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles btnbrowse_Source.Click
	txtsource.Text = ""

	Try
		OpenFileDialog1.Filter = "IETM files (*.bel)|*.bel|All files (*.*)|*.*"
		OpenFileDialog1.FileName = ""
		'FolderBrowserDialog1.ShowNewFolderButton = True

		If OpenFileDialog1.ShowDialog = Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK Then

			publish_Source = OpenFileDialog1.FileName

			'Only select PART_NUMBER folder
			'The folder should have name.txt
			'Otherwise consider them as invalid folder
			If publish_Source.Substring(publish_Source.LastIndexOf("\") + 1).StartsWith("9") And publish_Source.ToUpper.EndsWith(".BEL") Then
				txtsource.Text = publish_Source

				'Dim L0_part_no1 As String = txt_partno.Text.ToString
				'Dim ProjectFolder As New System.IO.DirectoryInfo("" + Mid(publish_Source, 1, publish_Source.Length) + "\" & L0_part_no1)
				'If Not Directory.Exists(txtsource.Text) Then
				'    check_pjtfolder = False
				'    MsgBox("Project folder not found in the " + txtsource.Text + " drive")
				'Else
				'    btnbrowse_Destination.Enabled = True
				'End If

				'strExt = System.IO.Path.GetExtension(OpenFileDialog1.FileName)
				'strExt = strExt.ToUpper()

			Else
				check_pjtfolder = False
				MsgBox("Please select valid file")
			End If

		End If

	Catch ex As Exception
		Throw ex
	End Try

End Sub
